none: 香川県本山寺の算額 (複製)・Sangaku of Motoyama Temple, Kagawa (Replica)
本山寺様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。 版権所有・We would like to thank Motoyamaji Temple for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive.  All Rights Reserved
香川県三豊市豊中町本山甲1445 ‎・1445 Motoyama Ko, Toyonaka-cho, Mitoyo City, Kagawa Prefecture
仮名九上総介義延・Kana Kujo Sosuke Yoshinobu
保管所：香川県丸亀市一番丁城内　丸亀市立資料館・Storage location: Marugame City, Ichibanchō Jōnai, Kagawa Prefecture — Marugame City Museum
